name: Falls, Balls, and Walls
description:
A game created for UCI's VGDC Fall 2017 Proto Game Jam with the theme "Don't Stop Me Now."

Disclaimer:

My first ever game project. Might be very buggy.

Note:

The volume of the game is VERY loud so be careful if you use headphones.

Created By:

Ace Lowder

Jacob Mikesell
